title: Gangplank barrels
body: Why id riot feel the need to give it % armour pen, and the ability to crit?

replies.body:
I suppose the trade off is that GP has to wait for the barrels to activate, and it gives you enough time to escape their range.
Which is a lot more counterplay than most champion abilities.

Which means GP needs to play smart, and either set up more complex formations of barrels, or coordinate with his teammates and use their CC to keep you in the barrel radius. 

If you're having trouble with it, i would recommend playing GP for a little while, and getting used to the timing of his barrels, then when you play against him you can AA his barrel just before it activates. 
_(and NOTHING tilts a GP more than the enemy killing his barrels just before he blows them up, every time :P)_
i paly support, mostly melee ones, having to be close enough to engage without being in barrel range is difficult, especially when they tick down faster than he places them late game.
